00010 #define NCNINT 3 
00011 #define NCNFLO 0
00012 #define NCNDBL 0
00013 
00014 
00015 #define ICOORDSHIFT 16
00016 #define JCOORDSHIFT 8
00017 #define KCOORDSHIFT 0
00018 
00019

00033 class ConnCellMappingHcal : public LCFixedObject<NCNINT,NCNFLO,NCNDBL> {
00034   
00035 public: 
00036   
00039   ConnCellMappingHcal(int connpin, int icd_fine, int jcd_fine, 
00040   int kcd_fine , int icd_coarse, int jcd_coarse, int kcd_coarse) {
00041 
00042     int cellID_fine = ( icd_fine << ICOORDSHIFT) | (jcd_fine << JCOORDSHIFT) | (kcd_fine << KCOORDSHIFT) ;
00043     int cellID_coarse = (icd_coarse << ICOORDSHIFT) | (jcd_coarse << JCOORDSHIFT) | (kcd_coarse << KCOORDSHIFT) ;
00044 
00045     obj()->setIntVal( 0 , connpin  ) ;
00046     obj()->setIntVal( 1 , cellID_fine  ) ;
00047     obj()->setIntVal( 2 , cellID_coarse  ) ;
00048   }
00049 
00052   ConnCellMappingHcal(LCObject* obj) : LCFixedObject<NCNINT,NCNFLO,NCNDBL>(obj) { } 
00053 
00055   virtual ~ConnCellMappingHcal() { /* no op*/  }
00056   
00057 
00060   int getConnpin()   { return obj()->getIntVal(0) ;  } 
00061   int getCellID_fine()   { return obj()->getIntVal(1);  } 
00062   int getCellID_coarse()   { return obj()->getIntVal(2);  } 
00063 
00064 
00067   short getCellIndex_fine(std::string);   
00068   short getCellIndex_coarse(std::string);   
00069   void print(  std::ostream& os) ;
00070   
00071 
00072   // -------- need to implement abstract methods from LCGenericObject
00073 
00075   const std::string getTypeName() const { 
00076     return"SiPM_MappingHcal" ;
00077   } 
00078   
00079   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00080     return "i:SiPMID,i:cassetteID,i:cellID" ;
00081   }
